google_dataproc_cluster_iam.description: Collection of resources to manage IAM policy for a Dataproc cluster.

cluster.description: The name or relative resource id of the cluster to manage IAM policies for.

member/members.description: Identities that will be granted the privilege in `role`.

role.description: The role that should be applied. Only one

policy_data.description: The policy data generated by a `google_iam_policy` data source.

project.description: The project in which the cluster belongs. If it

region.description: The region in which the cluster belongs. If it

etag.description: (Computed) The etag of the clusters's IAM policy.
